body: The cost of this task is **1 hour** (this is exactly how much will be paid, not less not more) when the task is done
@yegor256 This task is yours, please go ahead keeping in mind [this](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles)
@yegor256 please post your status here.. Keep in mind that every task is expected to be finished in a few days maximum.
@yegor256 please don't touch this task, someone else will pick it up, thanks
@haruda can you please help? Keep in mind [this](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles). If you have any technical questions, don't hesitate to ask right here
@dmarkov I will be able to do this task tomorrow. My time is UTC+3.
@haruda since there is no activity in the last few days in this task I decided to ask you to let us know what's going on... How are things going?

Hi,
Sorry for keeping silence for so long time. I was busy on other
project. I could do tasks assigned to me only after new year in first
days of january. You could reassign them if somebody else is able to
do them earlier.
Best regards and happy new year!
